thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com
thread.title: Peter

author: Peter
title: Peter
text: Moving house on your own is difficult, ive only just started and discovered Airtasker and what a fab platform and help its been assisting me with various things i cant do or keep up with. Gone it seems is the old days of looking up someone for something then waiting for them to show to Quote: then booking then them,then them not showing up or whatever,,, now post job, read reference on your tradie and put up some images and measurements and hey presto job responded to and done,,,, no fuss. I have had two jobs posted and on both occasions my tradie showed on time , were very personable and did a fab pro job then cleaning up and leaving in record time,,, i posted a job for cleaning at 6.30 am on a Sunday and bang job assigned,,, excellent service and response ,, If your a tradie or good at what you do get on here and get mobile with Airtasker,,, Peter ~ Sydney
